headline: Dayforce Now Available in the Microsoft Azure Marketplace
summary: MINNEAPOLIS and TORONTO, April 23, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Dayforce, Inc. (NYSE: DAY; TSX: DAY), a global leader in human capital management (HCM) technology that makes work life better, today announced the availability of its Dayforce™ platform in the Microsoft Azure Marketplace, an online store providing applications and services for use on Azure. By increasing accessibility to Dayforce’s AI-powered global people platform, Microsoft Azure customers can now smoothly integrate enterprise resour
